thread.title: Good location in paris
thread.title_full: Good location in paris - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Faubourg Saint-Martin, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: monkfish3366
title: Good location in paris
text: Hotel is in a good location had the metro + buses and shopping near by and good bars + restaurants the room in the hotel was very clean and had a coffee machine for the morning time the continental breakfast was not bad either + the hotel staff very good & helpful
